sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-alert
    v-bind="$attrs"
    class="v-alert--material"
    dark
    v-on="$listeners"
  >
    <template
      v-if="$attrs.icon"
      v-slot:prepend
    >
      <v-icon
        class="v-alert__icon elevation-6 white"
        light
        :color="$attrs.color"
      >
        {{ $attrs.icon }}
      </v-icon>
    </template>

    <slot />

    <template
      v-if="$attrs.dismissible"
      v-slot:close="{ toggle }"
    >
      <v-btn
        :aria-label="$vuetify.lang.t('$vuetify.close')"
        color
        icon
        small
        @click="toggle"
      >
        <v-icon>
          $vuetify.icons.cancel
        </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-alert>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'MaterialAlert',
  }
</script>

<style lang="sass">

  .v-alert--material
    margin-top: 32px

    .v-alert__icon
      top: -36px

    .v-alert__dismissible
      align-self: flex-start
      margin: 0 !important
      padding: 0 !important
</style>
